subject: Baseball
Music
World Series
lead_paragraph: The Giants have adopted Journey’s “Don’t Stop Believin'” as an anthem, and Steve Perry, a fan of the team, regularly leads crowds in singalongs at AT&T Park.
snippet: The Giants have adopted Journey’s “Don’t Stop Believin'” as an anthem, and Steve Perry, a fan of the team, regularly leads crowds in singalongs at AT&T Park.
